random_question.chosen_for_you: The Question We Have Chosen For You
random_question.info: Click the + button below to add the question to your favourite.

languages.information: Restart the application to complete your language change.

information.information_detail: You can contribute to the development of your English by generating random English questions in the application. Also, if you like the random questions produced, you can add these questions to your favorite list. You can also help us enrich my pool of random questions by sending us the questions you have created.
